reporter_caption.center: ORDER AMENDING RULE 90 OF THE FAMILY COURT RULES OF CIVIL PROCEDURE

opinion.opinion_text:
This 12th day of Sept., 2002, it is ordered that Rule 90 of the Family Court Rules of Civil Procedure is amended as follows:
Rule 90. Attorneys.
1. Amend subsection (F) by replacing "$100.00" with "$300.00" in the first sentence.
This amendment shall be effective 30 days after notice to the members of the Bar.
